dropin.name: openFirstPaymentMethod
dropin.description: When enabled, Drop-in opens the first payment method automatically on page load. Defaults to true.

dropin.name: openFirstStoredPaymentMethod
dropin.description: When enabled, Drop-in opens the payment method with stored card details on page load. This option takes precedence over openFirstPaymentMethod. Defaults to true.

dropin.name: showStoredPaymentMethods
dropin.description: Shows or hides payment methods with stored card details. Defaults to true.

dropin.name: showRemovePaymentMethodButton
dropin.description: Allows the shopper to remove a stored payment method. Defaults to false.

dropin.name: showPaymentMethods
dropin.description: Shows or hides regular (not stored) payment methods. Set to false if you only want to show payment methods with stored card details. Defaults to true.

dropin.name: setStatusAutomatically
dropin.description: Set to false to not set the Drop-in status to 'loading' when onSubmit is triggered. Defaults to true.

dropin.name: instantPaymentTypes
dropin.description: Moves payment methods to the top of the list of available payment methods. This is available for Apple Pay and Google Pay.

card.name: brands
card.description: Array of card brands that will be recognized. For a list of possible values, refer to [Supported card types](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#supported-card-types).

card.name: brandsConfiguration
card.description: Object where you can customize the icons for different brands.

card.name: showBrandIcon
card.description: Set to false to not show the brand logo when the card brand has been recognized.

card.name: showBrandsUnderCardNumber
card.description: Shows brand logos under the card number field when the shopper selects the card payment method.

card.name: enableStoreDetails
card.description: Set to true to show the checkbox for saving the card details for recurring payments.

card.name: hasHolderName
card.description: Set to true to show the input field for the cardholder name.

card.name: holderNameRequired
card.description: Set to true to make the cardholder name a required field. To show the field, you additionally need to set `hasHolderName` to true

card.name: positionHolderNameOnTop
card.description: Renders the cardholder name field at the top of the payment form.

card.name: hideCVC
card.description: Set to true to hide the CVC field.

card.name: configuration.socialSecurityNumberMode
card.description: Renders a social security number field. For example, this is required for certain card payments in Brazil. Possible values are: show, hide, auto

card.name: styles
card.description: Set a style object to customize the card input fields. For a list of supported properties, refer to [Styling card input fields](https://docs.adyen.com/payment-methods/cards/custom-card-integration#styling).

card.name: billingAddressRequired
card.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

card.name: billingAddressAllowedCountries
card.description: Set to true to collect the shopper's billing address and mark the fields as required.

card.name: data
card.description: Object that contains placeholder information that you can use to prefill fields

card.name: installmentOptions
card.description: If you want to offer credit card installments, specify here the numbers of monthly installments that the shopper can choose from.

card.name: showInstallmentAmounts
card.description: If you want to offer credit card installments, set to true to show the payment amount per installment.

card.name: minimumExpiryDate
card.description: If a shopper enters a date that is earlier than specified here, they will see the following error:'Your card expires before check out date.'

card.name: autoFocus
card.description: Automatically move the focus from date field to the CVC field.

card.name: SRConfig
card.description: Object for configuring screen reader behavior. Does not affect what gets rendered in the checkout form.

properties.name: collateErrors
properties.description: Indicates if all errors in the form are read out after each validation. For example, if there is an error in the card number field, the error is read out after validating each of the other fields, until the error is fixed.

properties.name: moveFocus
properties.description: Indicates if focus automatically switches to the first field with an error when the shopper selects the Pay button. Can only be set if SRConfig.collateErrors is true

ach.name: enableStoreDetails
ach.description: Set to true to show the checkbox for saving the card details for recurring payments.

affirm.name: visibility
affirm.description: Set the visibility attribute on specific fields.

properties.name: personalDetails
properties.description: Override visibility attribute. Posible values are hidden, readOnly, and editable

properties.name: billingAddress
properties.description: Override visibility attribute. Posible values are hidden, readOnly, and editable.

properties.name: deliveryAddress
properties.description: Override visibility attribute. Posible values are hidden, readOnly, and editable.
